pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2 Luo4 shan1 ji1 Fen1 xiao4
containing_words.word: 加利福尼亞大學洛杉磯分校

sentences.english: The study is spearheaded by students from University of California.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究是由加利福尼亞大學學生帶頭進行的。

sentences.english: Alex Filippenko, astrophysicist, University of California, Berkeley.
sentences.chinese: 天體物理學家，伯克萊加利福尼亞大學。
